name: Byte and Bite B&B Backend Project
desc: B&B! This project aims to connect customers with local cooks who offer delicious homemade food, providing a convenient and diverse culinary experience.

name: Quiz App Project
desc: The aim of the quiz app is to entertain and educate users by offering engaging quizzes on various topics, promoting both fun and learning.

name: Store Locator Project
desc: The aim of this store locator project is to help users find nearby stores and access information about them, facilitating convenient shopping and navigation..
